The crystal crown is a purely cosmetic crown purchasable from the Lliann's Wares in Prifddinas's Ithell district for 250,000,000 coins. The crown is untradeable, and it cannot be alchemised or sold back to Lliann's shop.

Upon death below level 20 Wilderness, it will remain on the ground, to be reclaimed like most untradeable items. However, above level 20 it is lost and the killer receives 30,000,000 coins.

The crown's colours may be changed by buying crystals from the same store, which cost 500,000 coins each. The colours are based around the Elven Clans.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The item's extremely long shop restock time is equal to 250 million game ticks, one tick per coin that the item costs. However, like all shops, it restocks on server restarts (e.g. game updates).

The '''crystal crown''' is a purely cosmetic crown purchasable from the [[Lliann's Wares]] in [[Prifddinas]]'s Ithell district for 250,000,000 coins. The crown is untradeable, and it cannot be alchemised or sold back to [[Lliann]]'s shop.

Upon death below level 20 [[Wilderness]], it will remain on the ground, to be reclaimed like most untradeable items. However, above level 20 it is lost and the killer receives 30,000,000 coins.

The crown's colours may be changed by buying crystals from the same store, which cost 500,000 coins each. The colours are based around the [[Elven Clans]].
